mapper.select: SELECT * FROM STOREINFO WHERE MANAGENO = #{manageNo} and STORENO = #{storeNo}
SELECT A.*, B.REVIEWPIC1 AS pFile FROM REVIEWINFO A LEFT JOIN REVIEWPIC B ON A.REVIEWNO = B.REVIEWNO WHERE A.STORENO=#{storeNo} ORDER BY A.REVIEWNo
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEWINFO (REVIEWNO, USERNO, STORENO, AVGSCORE, REVIEWCONTENTS, REVIEWDATE) VALUES(REVIEWNUM.NEXTVAL,#{arg1},#{arg0},#{arg2.avgScore},#{arg2.reviewContents}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT STOREINFO.STORENO , STOREINFO.STORENAME FROM STOREINFO, FAVORITE WHERE STOREINFO.STORENO = FAVORITE.STORENO AND FAVORITE.USERNO=1 AND FAVORITECHECK = 'y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEWPIC (reviewNo, userNo,storeNo, reviewPic1) VALUES (REVIEWNUM.CURRVAL,#{userNo},#{storeNo}, #{reviewPic1})
